name: pomposity
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being too serious and showing that you think you are very important: His pomposity and arrogance became clear in the interview. See
pompous
More examplesFewer examplesBeneath all his pomposity, he was a kind man. She made a little joke in an effort to puncture his pomposity. Moore is at his best when sending up the pompousness and vanity of politicians. I hate pompousness, barking out orders, and hierarchy.
